title: Energy Kyouka!!
synopsis: Kyouka Shiraishi is a beautiful and lively high school student. Thanks to a well-developed body and seductive nature, no man is able to resist her allure. One day, she finds herself in dire need of cash to pay off her cell phone bills. Without a quick way to find a substantial amount of money, she decides to make use of her natural giftsâ€”and there is no better place to do so than her own school.
